label: 伝法灌頂
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
見出し読み: でんぼう かんじょう

説明文: Transmissions of the minutia of ritual practice, and by extension, disciples of a ritual master who received such transmissions.
